comments.body: You need a license type here in order to make sure the package allows redistribution. I don't see license type on pypi nor the repo. Can you please open an issue in the repo so a license file is added?

the authors have added a LICENSE file to the development version but the current pypi sources don't have a LICENSE file. Should I hold off this PR until a version with license_file is available on pypi?
I've just released a new version on pypi with additional license metadata.
@sbrugman I've modified the recipe accordingly for 0.0.4. Would you like to be a maintainer?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  license: BSD
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'
  description: |
    This module provides access to character properties for all Unicode 
    characters, from the Unicode Character Database (UCD). This module
